ygData.subject: Re: Megatron vs. Galvatron
ygData.msgSnippet: HYdras yelled our with a roar. Almost felt like a shock wave left his mouth with the scream. A ball of fire burst from him and dissipated a few inches away

HYdras yelled our with a roar. Almost felt like a shock wave left his mouth 
with the scream. A ball of fire burst from him and dissipated a few inches 
away from him.."All who are loyal let us go back to Megaton's base. We will 
figure out what to do about the other ship there."

--part1_19b.91671ba.2abd4353_boundary
